entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 12:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 2.2°C
Wind: SW 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches developing overnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 this evening then falling. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 20 February 2023
